group_1.narration: A wish, a wish, a wonderful wish.@"If I become a Magical Girl,@he'll grant me a wish."@"If you promise to kill Witches,@I'll grant you one wish."@Tell me, what is your wish?

group_1.textLeft: What is a "wish", anyway?
What should I ask for, for it to be@considered a wish?

group_1.textRight: You're asking what a "wish" is?
You'd know better than me.
I think you humans have a better@understanding of that sort of thing.
Let me see...
I suppose it's what you would call a desire.
A wish could be to improve one's charm or@intelligence, finances or authority.
I've even had someone wish to put their @past behind them.

group_1.narration: The only stories I've ever spent any time@thinking about were tragedies.@So, I had no idea what to say when I was@suddenly asked about my desires and wishes.@After all, the people who got their wishes@granted in those stories ended up miserable.@I don't want to become miserable.
There are things I don't want,@and things I do want...@If I wish for the opposite of a tragedy,@will it become a happy story?@I didn't know the answer.

group_1.textLeft: Your explanation doesn't make sense to me.
Besides, if I make a wish...
It seems to suggest that I'm not satisfied@with my life.

group_1.textRight: You don't seem to be all that healthy,@for one.
Your home is dimly lit, and it's littered@with garbage everywhere.
Compared to those around you, you aren't@exactly wealthy.
Add to that your interpersonal relationships@and circumstances.
One can refer to one's own circumstances,@should they be below average...
With the word "dissatisfied".
Put in those terms, I think there aren't@many elements of your life...
...that you can say you aren't even slightly@dissatisfied with.

group_1.textLeft: That's not a very nice way to put it.
In any case, money does sound nice.
But I know what happens in my stories.
When people wish for money...
It never ends well for them.
The proper way to obtain money is to happen@upon it.
I also don't agree with using special powers@to get things that aren't very special.
That seems like a waste.

group_1.textRight: You have a point.
It depends on how much money you need@and if you don't mind damaging your name...
But a Magical Girl's powers could solve@financial problems to a certain extent.

group_1.textLeft: What do you think, Kyubey?
From your perspective, what do I most need@to wish for?

group_1.textRight: That's a difficult question...
We have different standards and values@than you humans.

group_1.textLeft: It doesn't have to be your opinion.
You've made contracts with lots of people@until now.
I'm sure you've met a human who is similar@to me.
You can't answer?

group_1.textRight: Of course, I did profile you before@approaching you.
I know of several model cases with similar@backgrounds and personalities.
They have similar circumstances, and are in@similar geographical areas.
But I don't think you'll agree, even if I@tell you what they wished for.

group_1.textLeft: Just tell me.

group_1.textRight: "I want a specific person to be interested@in me and like me."
That's a common wish.
In other words, they wish for "love".

group_1.textLeft: I'm already loved enough.

group_1.textRight: I thought you might say that.
